    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    Market.purchaseItem(Item purchasedItem)
    trys to subtract cost of item from team balance if sufficient funds, adds item to inventory then removes item from purchasable items else produces InsuffientBalanceError
    void
    Market.sellItems(Item soldItem)
    adds item to market increases balance by item price removes item from team inventory
    void
    Item.useItem(Item item, Athlete athlete)
    takes the athlete param and boosts their stats based on item stats
